title: Expression Evaluators
description: Bugs are fun but this time I want to talk about win. Recently I finished work on a recursive descent expression evaluator in the Bandcamp code. (That’s a mouthful and I enjoy slinging that whenever I can—it’s up there with binary space partitions.) An expression evaluator is something that can take a sequence of characters […]

title: Regaining Lost Knowledge
description: Rediscovery of Indexable Skiplists in the solution of the Running Median problem.
